name: Namco Museum Vol. 1
overview: Namco Museum Vol. 1 is a virtual museum/arcade that allows the player to play the classic Namco games "Pac-Man", "Rally-X", "Galaga", "Bosconian", "Pole Position" and "Toy Pop". The museum also includes history on these games, as well as pictures of merchandise, pamphlets, circuit boards, and cabinet decorations.
